xmlhelpers

Class XMLNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • xmlhelpers.XMLNode

  • public class XMLNode
extends Object
    Class that represents an XML node. This class is used as a wrapper of Node and contains useful functions for abstract parsing.
    Author:
    themis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XMLNode(Node node)
      Initializes this object given an XML node.
      XMLNode(String name)
      Initializes this object given a name.

      • addNewChildNodes

        Adds a list of nodes as child nodes to this node.
        Parameters:
        newChildNodes - the list of nodes to be added as new child nodes to this node.

      • removeParentNode

        public void removeParentNode()
        Removes the parent node of this node. After calling this function, the parent of the parent node becomes the new parent node of this node.

      • replaceChild

        public void replaceChild(XMLNode newChild,
                         XMLNode oldChild)
        Replaces a child node of this node with another new child node.
        Parameters:
        newChild - the child to replace the current child.
        oldChild - the child that is replaced.

        Returns:
        the removed child node.
